note: CC106 - Export DV Luxury 900mm Cabinets & Benchtops
expression:
FOREACH $$choice$$ IN $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size$$ ,
    IF $$choice/item$$ == "Luxury 900mm" //NEED TO FIND WHAT ADDENDA SAYS
    THEN
        // Set variables
        $cabpanels = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Cabinetry & Fixed Panels/Bathroom/item$$
        $benchtop = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Bathroom/item$$

        //Choose AND export Luxury Cabinets
        SWITCH($cabpanels,
            CASE "OAKWOOD", 
                EXPORT("106.445", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
            CASE "PORTLAND ASH", 
                EXPORT("106.447", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
            CASE "DIAMOND WHITE GLOSS", 
                EXPORT("106.448", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
            CASE "TEAKWOOD", 
                EXPORT("106.449", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "DV Cabinet Colour not found")
        )

        //Choose AND export luxury single basin benchtops (ULTIMO CUTOUT)
        SWITCH($benchtop,
            CASE "ICELAND", 
                EXPORT("106.0116", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
            CASE "COTTON WHITE", 
                EXPORT("106.0118", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
            CASE "CARRERA", 
                EXPORT("106.0120", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
            CASE "STORM GREY", 
                EXPORT("106.0123", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "DV Benchtop Colour not found")
        )

    //Add installs
    EXPORT("106.815", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
    EXPORT("106.715", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")

    ENDIF 
NEXT
